channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Loose paving slab sticking up, causing someone to trip and fall, 31st December
item.description:
On Royal Well Place, on the left hand side of the road heading south (on the same side as the Scandinavian Coffee Pod) opposite Starline Taxis.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royal Well Place, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes at entry to Govt site, 31st December
item.description:
There are multiple potholes on the entrance to the Govt site at this location. The area of road comes under Gloucestershire Highways control and needs to be repaired by them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hubble Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole around drain covers, 31st December
item.description:
As you enter Bamfurlong Lane there are 2 drain covers and the tarmac has eroded away around the outside of both. This is dangerous for cyclists who already have to avoid the poor road surface outside the lorry depot.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 31st December
item.description:
F/W eroded - please reinstate 5m of edge f/w kerbing and a tarmac patch of 5500mm x 1500mm - 8.25m2 - F/W Closure (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 30cm plus pothole on Clyde Crescent on the road close to the gutter in front of houses 7 clyde cres and 5 clyde cres, 31st December
item.description:
Pothole is on the road outside 5 clyde crescent and 7 clyde crescent. It has been there for about 3 weeks now and is getting progressively worse and growing. It was originally one pothole, now 2
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Clyde Crescent, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
